channel.title: Nulls, nulls, and more nulls. [317]
channel.description: greetings Moparscape community, The issue I am having is with an old school source. I have searched far and wide to no avail. What I seek is an anti null script. I already have a connection flooder preventative implemented in the source. What I want is the null handler that allows nulls to connect, but, insted of keeping them online to show up in my player list, it disconnects them. Any help appreciated (I'm getting tired of needing to reset the server every 30 mins to prevent lag, lol) Thanks in advance, Chris

item.title: Nulls, nulls, and more nulls. [317]
item.dc:creator: @GDXChris GDXChris
